title: imac A1418 screens are the same?
message: A1418 are the same from 2013 to 2017?

imac A1418 screens are the same?
message: The Retina (4K) came out in late 2015. 2014 should be the standard 2K res.

title: imac A1418 screens are the same?
message:
There is a slight difference it the backlight cable between 2012 and 2014. It will fit fit and work though.

Of course the 4K models have a totally different LCD.
